com.tagtraum.audioplayer4j.AudioDevice

  • Packages that use AudioDevice 
    Package Description
    com.tagtraum.audioplayer4j
    Simple (non-visual) audio player.
    com.tagtraum.audioplayer4j.device
    Different audio devices.
    com.tagtraum.audioplayer4j.java
    Pure Java-backed audio player.
    com.tagtraum.audioplayer4j.javafx
    JavaFX-backed audio player.
    com.tagtraum.audioplayer4j.macos
    Natively-backed implementation for macOS.

      Current audio device.

      List audio devices installed on the system.
      Methods in com.tagtraum.audioplayer4j with parameters of type AudioDevice 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void AudioDevicesListener.deviceChanged​(AudioDevice[] oldDevices, AudioDevice[] currentDevices)
      Is called, whenever AudioDevices are added or removed.
      static AudioPlayer AudioPlayerFactory.open​(URI uri, AudioDevice audioDevice)
      Opens an AudioPlayer instance suitable for the given URI using the given audio device for playback.
      void AudioPlayer.setAudioDevice​(AudioDevice audioDevice)
      Sets the desired audio device.
